short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin to auto save portal profiles. Ensure to have proper authorization to access the portal data from respective providers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Rekrutbot.ai, to automatically save profiles from supported job portals. User responsibility to ensure they have proper authorization and user agreements with the job portals to access their information. The extension requires subscription to Rekrutbot.ai.
